Asp.Net MVC Source Text Differences Compare

this project purpose is to create javascript popup that will compare files content like in bitbucket or any other source control.

i came across a need to compare 2 text files (xml) that was uploaded by a workflow,
after upload we wanted to review the files and edit them.

initially the file was downloaded, modified and uploaded to the same location while overwriting the old one.

we wanted to improve that by being able to review the text file, edit it, compare diffs and save them, and maybe while were at it verify the modified file is a valid xml and some other security issues and logic issues to prevent mistakes.

i dont have much time to work on that, but i thought, hey, it seems like something a lot of people would want...

so enjoy and contribute.

i used code from:
Pretty Text Diff - for the text compare
jQuery File Upload - for the file upload
Code Mirror - for the xml editor
PDFObject - for the pdf div

for just the code editor style you can use:
Code Mirror Merge
